import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { InnerLayout } from '../../styles/Layouts' import Chart from '../Charts/Charts' import { useGlobalContext } from '../../context/globalContext' function Dashboard() { const{totalExpense,totalIncome,getIncomes,getExpense}= useGlobalContext() useEffect(()=>{ totalExpense() totalIncome() },[]) return ( < DashboardStyled>

All Transaction

Total Income

Rs{totalIncome()}

Total Expense

Rs{totalExpense()}

Total Balance

Rs{totalIncome()-totalExpense()}

History

History will be shown here

 ) } const DashboardStyled = styled.div` h1{ color: rgba(34, 34, 96, 1); } `; export default Dashboard;
